{{userName}}

In Dekalb County, AL

Takeda Ig treatments are covered with restrictions* for Medicare patients under the pharmacy benefit.

Takeda immune globulin (Ig) treatments include CUVITRU® [Immune Globulin Subcutaneous (Human)] 20% Solution and HYQVIA® [Immune Globulin Infusion 10%
(Human) with Recombinant Human Hyaluronidase] Solution.

*Restrictions may include prior authorization and/or step therapy requirements. Check with the individual health plan's medical policy.

Coverage data are provided by Managed Markets Insights & Technology, LLC, and are current as of [Month Year].
